alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 4:33AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of West Tennessee, including the following counties, Haywood, Lauderdale, Madison and Tipton. * WHEN...Until 730 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The heaviest rainfall has occurred from near Covington to Brownsville. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Brownsville, Covington, Holly Grove, Belle Eagle, Mercer, Bemis, Henning, Allens, Sunnyhill, Jones, Leighton, Oakview, Christmasville, Shepp, Denmark, Huntersville, Neely, Turnpike and Westover. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
